attributes.action: make plastic and glass bottles have a returnable deposit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
when i was a child i remember taking old bottles of r.whites and corona bottles back to the shop and get the 10p deposit back. why don't the government enforce a levy of 15p on all bottle's including plastic and when returned the customer gets 10p deposit back with the extra 5p going into recycling the bottles,
this would encourage people to recycle rewarding them when they return these waste products. instead of trying to force people to pay to have the bins empty which will lead to fly-tipping and neighbour disputes when rubbish has been dumped in the wrong bins.
  this levy would include beer bottles soft drinks (glass) bottles and jars, plastic water bottles soft drinks (plastic) and milk containers (plastic), it could even be extended to cans and tins at maybe 5p charge and a 3p return,
